languages.text: {n}Проктор коротко кивает.{/n} "Принято. Покинем корабль, когда вы будете готовы".
{n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Acknowledged. We will depart when you're ready."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne asiente.{/n} «Entendido. Nos marcharemos cuando esté satisfech{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Acknowledged. We will depart when you're ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne asiente.{/n} «Entendido. Nos marcharemos cuando esté satisfech{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙点了点头。{/n}“了解，等你准备好之后，我们立刻出发。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Acknowledged. We will depart when you're ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙点了点头。{/n}“了解，等你准备好之后，我们立刻出发。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne opine du chef.{/n} « Entendu. Nous partirons dès que vous serez {mf|prêt|prête}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Acknowledged. We will depart when you're ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne opine du chef.{/n} « Entendu. Nous partirons dès que vous serez {mf|prêt|prête}. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンうなずく。{/n}「わかりました。準備ができたら出発します」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Acknowledged. We will depart when you're ready."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンうなずく。{/n}「わかりました。準備ができたら出発します」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı. Hazır olduğunuzda yola çıkacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Acknowledged. We will depart when you're ready."

traits.locale_text: "{n}Solomorne başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı. Hazır olduğunuzda yola çıkacağız."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nickt.{/n} "Verstanden. Wir brechen auf, sobald Ihr bereit seid."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods.{/n} "Acknowledged. We will depart when you're ready."
